attributes.action: Bring Back the Death penatly for murder and do it humanly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i propose to bring back the death penatly intheunited kingdom for people who commit murdur,as long as the the trial and evedince was rock solid i believe nowis the time to do this as we have the techonlgy to make sure the suspect is given a fair trial and make sure they are guilty we need to change it is time for change a eye for a eye and a tooth for a tooth

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
